name: Holy Knights
description:
Holy Knights is a real time strategy game, focusing on pve content

Summon your units directly on to the battlefield

Support your units with spells 

Defend your base with defense tower


Eradicate the enemies

Controls

Default 

- Select Units : Left Mouse, Drag Left Mouse

- Move/Command Units : Right Mouse

- Summon Units : Click on Icon -> Click in World, hold shift to summon more

- Camera Movement: WASD, Mousewheel

- Attack Move : Q

- Hold Position : H

- Jump to Fight : B

- Jump to HQ: Spacebar

-  All Army : F2

- Create Hotkey-Group : Strg + 1-9

- Add to Hotkey-Group : Shift + 1-9

- Select Hotkey-Group : 1-9

Tips & tricks

- Check your input settings at the beginning

- Hold shift while summoning to chain summons

- Press spacebar to jump to your HQ

- Don't hold back, 90 % of dead units, buildings and spells are refunded over time

- Jump per minimap is currently not available, more hotkey options will be added

What is playable content?

- 2 different maps with 10-15 min playtime each , +tutorial, +stress-test lvl

- 2 different enemy types, 3 player units, 3 player spells, 1 player building
